name: Learn CSS Grid
description: A powerful tool that allows for two-dimensional layouts to be created on the web and was created as a resource to help developers better understand and learn Grid.

name: CSS Grid generator
description: A way for people to use CSS Grid features quickly to create dynamic layouts.

name: CSS Tricks
description: This website shows how to use CSS elegantly and efficiently.

name: CSS Reference
description: Learn by example: this website is a free visual guide to CSS. It features the most popular properties, and explains them with illustrated and animated examples.

name: Grid by Example
description: This site is a collection of examples, video and other information to help you learn CSS Grid Layout.

name: How to Center in CSS
description: This website consolidates ways to center in CSS and generates the code for each situation.

name: CSS specifishity
description: Specify the priority of CSS selectors using pictures with plankton, fish and sharks.

name: Beautiful CSS box-shadow examples
description: A curated collection of 93 free box-shadow examples from some of the most beautiful websites on the internet.

name: Animista
description: Animista is a CSS animation library and a place where you can play with a collection of ready-made CSS animations and download only those you will use.

name: CSS Layout
description: Popular layouts and patterns made with CSS only.

name: CSS Scan
description: The fastest and easiest way to check, copy and edit CSS.

name: Get Waves
description: A free SVG wave generator to make unique SVG waves for your next web design. Choose a curve, adjust complexity, randomize!

name: Responsively App
description: A must-have dev-tool that aids faster and precise responsive web development.

name: Unused CSS
description: Unused CSS is an online tool to remove unused CSS rules. It will check your pages, find unused CSS and let you download a clean CSS file.

name: CSS Gradient
description: CSS Gradient is a happy little website and free tool that lets you create a gradient background for websites.

name: Web Gradient
description: WebGradients is a free collection of 180 linear gradients that you can use as content backdrops in any part of your website.

name: Animate.css
description: Animate.css is a library of ready-to-use, cross-browser animations for you to use in your projects.

name: CSS Minifier
description: Online CSS Minifier/Compressor. Free! Provides an API. Simple Quick and Fast.

name: CSS Podcast
description: Online CSS Minifier/Compressor. Free! Provides an API. Simple Quick and Fast.
